body_html:
This should be very straightforward as just wrapping the glorot initializers in a class inherited from Initializer, and then overriding the call method to provide a default partition_info=None.

This parameter is not used in current implementation anyway. Though I assume it will be in the future to have consistent behavior with other initializers.

body:
This should be very straightforward as just wrapping the glorot initializers in a class inherited from Initializer, and then overriding the __call__ method to provide a default partition_info=None.

This parameter is not used in current implementation anyway. Though I assume it will be in the future to have consistent behavior with other initializers.

To tensortflowbutler,
